p: We calculated the percent increase, which indicated the influences of meteorological variables. All estimates of percent increase were complemented by a 95% confidence interval (CI) and p-value. The year variable was forced into the model to eliminate the effects of the long-term trends. All of these analyses were performed using R Project 3.0.2 (R Development Core Team, 2012). The geographic location of Guangzhou was created by ArcGIS 10.1(Environmental Systems Research Institute, Inc).
